about_the_game:
You are a Warden of Time with the ability to manipulate the flow of time to your whim, tasked with keeping time in order. Use this power to advance in this 2D Puzzle Adventure.

Story

The wardens are tasked with using their powers to fix distortions in the continuity of space-time. You play as Flux, one such warden, and receive word that recently distortions have been running rampant. In order to investigate you set out on adventure.

Time Manipulation

At the beginning you can record previous positions of yourself and set yourself back to them. Over the course of the game you will unlock more ways to manipulate time to advance ahead.

Time Manipulation

At the beginning you can record previous positions of yourself and set yourself back to them. Over the course of the game you will unlock more ways to manipulate time to advance ahead.
